panels.description: The Server's Java virtual machine uptime.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.title: Heap usage

panels.description: The % of CPU usage for the Server process.
panels.title: Process CPU Usage

panels.description: The number of error level events per minute that made it to the logs .
panels.title: Log Errors

panels.description: The number of client HTTP error exceptions per minute.
panels.title: Client HTTP Errors

panels.description: Rate of of log messages emit by the applicaiton
panels.title: Logs

panels.description: % of non-heap memory usage.
panels.title: Non-Heap usage

panels.description: System CPU (%) usage for the Server process.
panels.title: System CPU Usage

panels.description: The number of blocked threads.
panels.title: Blocked Threads

panels.description: The number of server HTTP error exceptions per minute.
panels.title: Server HTTP Errors

panels.description: The request duration within which you have served 95% of requests.
panels.title: HTTP Percentiles (last 5 min)

panels.description: he time of the slowest query
panels.title: Slowest Query

panels.description: The maximum query time for naturalId queries executed against the database.
panels.title: Slowest natural Id

panels.description:
* **deletes** - rate of collection deletes.
* **fetches**  - rate of collection fetches.
* **loads**  - rate of collection loads.
* **recreates** - rate of collection recreates.
* **updates** - rate of collection updates.
panels.title: Collections

panels.description: JPA Transactions Rate
panels.title: Transactions Rate

panels.description:
* **hit** - rate of timestamps successfully retrieved from cache.
* **miss** -  rate of of tables for which no update timestamps was not found in cache.
* **puts** - rate of of timestamps put in cache.
panels.title: Update Timestamp Cache

panels.description:
* **total** - rate of the executed queries
* **max** - the time of the slowest query
panels.title: Query Rate

panels.description:
* **hit** - rate of cached queries successfully retrieved from cache
* **miss** - rate of cached queries not found in cache
* **put** - rate of cacheable queries put in cache
panels.title: Query Caching

panels.description:
* **hit** - rate of cacheable entities/collections successfully retrieved from the cache
* **miss** -  rate of cacheable entities/collections not found in the cache and loaded from the database
* **put** - rate of cacheable entities/collections put in the cache
panels.title: Second Level Caching

panels.description:
**hit** - rate of cached naturalId lookups successfully retrieved from cache.

**miss** -  rate of cached naturalId lookups not found in cache.

**puts** - rate of cacheable naturalId lookups put in cache.

**query_natural** - rate of of naturalId queries executed against the database.
panels.title: Natural Id Cache

panels.description:
* **flushes** - rate of flushes executed by sessions (either implicit or explicit).
* **obtained** -  rate of connections number asked by the sessions. The actual number of connections used may be much smaller depending  whether you use a connection pool or not.
panels.title: Flushes / Obtained Connections

panels.description:
* **prepared** - rate of prepared statements that were acquired.
* **closed** - rate of prepared statements that were released.
panels.title: Statements

panels.description:
* **deletes** - rate of entity deletes.
* **inserts** - rate of entity inserts.
* **fetches** - rate of entity inserts.
* **loads** - rate of entity loads.
* **updates** - rate of entity updates.
panels.title: Entity information

panels.description: HikariCP Total connections.
panels.title: Total Connections

panels.description: HikariCP Idle Connections
panels.title: Idle Connections

panels.title: Active Connections

panels.title: Pending Connections

panels.description: HikariCP Max Connections
panels.title: Max Connections

panels.description: HikariCP Min Connections
panels.title: Min Connections

panels.description:
* **acquire** - average connection acquire time per request.
* **creation** - average connection creation time per request.
* **usage** - average connection usage time per request.
panels.title: HikariCP Connection Times

panels.description: Connection pool, timeout rate
panels.title: HikariCP Timeout Rate
